= Xml2sql =

== Intro ==

The problem is the {{{"<redirect />"}}} element in the XML file.

The error message is: 
{{{
./xml2sql unexpected element <redirect> ./xml2sql: parsing aborted at line 33 pos 16.
}}}

== Solution ==

Strip of the redirect-tags by using a perl script [http://wikokit.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/wikt_parser/doc/redirect_in_pages-articles.xml2sql/del_redirect_in_pages-articles_xml.pl `del_redirect_in_pages-articles_xml.pl`] with the following format:
{{{
perl del_redirect_in_pages-articles_xml.pl in_file out_file
}}}
